name: flatter
effect: Raises the target's Special Attack by one stage, then confuses it.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Confuses the foe, but
raises its SP. ATK.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Confuses the foe, but
raises its SP. ATK.

confuse the foe,
but its SP. ATK
also rises.
